amendment.description: An amendment numbered 533 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds by the Environmental Appeals Board to consider, review, reject, remand, or otherwise invalidate any permit issued for Outer Continental Shelf sources located offshore of the States along the Arctic Coast under the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A086) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 185 (Roll no. 94).
